pages.title: Binders
pages.text: Binders are a convenient way of storing your cards. Each set can craft a uniquely colored binder. The binder can be enchanted to give extra card space.

pages.title: Ender Binder
pages.text: There also exists the Ender Binder, which serves as the ender chest equivalent for binders. Only has one variant, but can also be enchanted.
